item.title: Get your first look at the 'Gilmore Girls' revival
item.description: The stars are back in Stars Hollow!
item.ExtractedText: 7 photos: The new 'Gilmore Girls' Emily Gilmore (Kelly Bishop) is as stylish as ever. Hide Caption 7 photos: The new 'Gilmore Girls' Rory is all grown up and teaching now. Hide Caption 3 of 7 7 photos: The new 'Gilmore Girls' This gives us hope that Lorelai and Luke Danes (Scott Patterson) are still very much in love. Hide Caption 7 photos: The new 'Gilmore Girls' Town hall meeting in Stars Hollow, perhaps? Hide Caption 7 photos: The new 'Gilmore Girls' Rory and her grandmother share a moment. Hide Caption 7 photos: The new 'Gilmore Girls' Lorelai serves up some colorful fashion. Hide Caption
